snippet: The move is the latest by the government to tame the once indomitable army.
abstract: Turkish military retires all 40 generals and admirals currently on trial on charges of plotting to overthrow the Muslim-led government, in the latest move by the government to tame the once indomitable army; with the continuing widespread purge of the army, concerns have been growing in Turkey about the country’s preparedness for war at a time when instability at its border with neighboring Syria has been intensifying.
lead_paragraph: The move is the latest by the government to tame the once indomitable army.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
